plot: Tenma and Milch are on the run with the injured Gustav and Helene. Eva finds her life in danger when she discovers that the attorney she's supposed to meet, Mr.Baul, is none other than Roberto.

Tenma makes a false confession and places the blame on himself. He is moved from the detention area of the police station to a prison. Meanwhile, upon learning that Tenma has confessed, Eva calls the lawyer Baul to tell him that she will testify to prove Tenma's innocence.—Anonymous
